section.name: Change field
section.span: How to change field properties of a field in all documents of a document type?

div.p: In a document type, fields can be changed by clicking on them in the documenttype (don't click in the field type menu!). After clicking on the field, the properties overview of that field appears and all properties can be changed just like when the field was first added. Here, the Title field was clicked and the size was changed from 60 to 68.

section.p: Ensure that you have the document type in edit mode. Click on the field to be changed in the document type and change any properties of that field in the properties overview of the field.
The changes will be available only after update all content. Read the warnings about it carefully. You may add or change more fields first.
